name: The Last One
description: Once a prosperous city Istanbul is fallen. Prepare your gear, defeat zombie hordes and reclaim your hometown. Uncover hidden story behind the disaster and learn what controls the zombies. Select your side between military and rebels and fight for the control of the city.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit) Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with 1 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8/10 (64 bit) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 9 GB available space
